thread.title: Brazil's BR to provide fuel to 20 Carrefour stations

title: Brazil's BR to provide fuel to 20 Carrefour stations
text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:20 PM / a few seconds ago Brazil's BR to provide fuel to 20 Carrefour stations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) - Petrobras Distribuidora SA will provide up to 2.3 billion liters of fuel to 20 hypermarkets and self-service stores owned by Carrefour SA for three years, the company said in a Tuesday filing. The logo of Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras is pictured in the company headquarters in Sao Paulo, Brazil February 20, 2018. REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker 
BR Distribuidora, as the fuel distribution unit of state-controlled oil company Petróleo Brasileiro SA is known, won the Carrefour contract in an auction held at the end of last year. Reporting by Marta Nogueira; Writing by Bruno Federowski; Editing by Sandra Maler
